Example

Ext.create('Ext.form.Panel', {
    title: 'Contact Info',
    width: 300,
    bodyPadding: 10,
    renderTo: Ext.getBody(),
    items: [{
        xtype: 'textfield',
        name: 'name',
        emptyText: "please enter name",
        fieldLabel: 'Name',
        allowBlank: false  // requires a non-empty value
    }]
});
